description: This cinnamon and raisin rice pudding is perfect comfort food.
keywords: Rice pudding,Pescatarian,Seafood free,Gluten free,Tree nut free,Egg free,Sesame free,Halal,Soy free,Wheat free,Vegetarian,Rice,Peanut free
name: Cinnamon & Raisin Rice Pudding Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Add the rice, milk and cinnamon to a large, heavy bottomed saucepan and bring to the boil. Reduce the heat and simmer for 25 minutes, stirring occasionally, until the rice is cooked through. Stir through the honey.
Heat the raisins with 100ml of water and the coconut sugar in a small pan until the raisins are plump and the syrup is bubbling.
Serve the rice pudding with raisins stirred through.
